sentences.en: Author presented mechanics of shallow saltwater recharge deep fresh water.
sentences.cn: 探讨了浅层咸水越流补给深层淡水的机理.

sentences.en: E TANK: YOU CAN TOTALLY RECHARGE YOUR ENERGY LEVEL WITH THIS ITEM.
sentences.cn: 罐: 使用这个道具,你能够立即完全回复你的生命能量.

sentences.en: Every night I recharge my mobile phone and myself!
sentences.cn: 每天晚上我都给手机和自己充电!

sentences.en: Exercise is a great way to relieve stress and recharge.
sentences.cn: 锻炼是一项非常好的缓解压力和“充电’的方法.

sentences.en: He is using your mains electricity to recharge his car battery.
sentences.cn: 他在用你家里的电源给他的车载蓄电池充电。

sentences.en: He plugged his razor in to recharge it.
sentences.cn: 他把剃刀插在插座上，给它充电。

sentences.en: He wanted to recharge his batteries and come back feeling fresh and positive.
sentences.cn: 他想去放松休息一下，然后精力充沛、干劲十足地回来。

sentences.en: House : They recharge? I just keep buying new phones.
sentences.cn: 可以充电的 吗 ?我只是一直买新电话.

sentences.en: I’m going to spend a week in the mountains to recharge my batteries.
sentences.cn: 我准备去山里待一个星期，恢复一下精力。

sentences.en: One needs adequate sleep to recharge one's tired mind and body.
sentences.cn: 我们需要适当的睡眠以使疲惫的心身再度获得充电.

sentences.en: Please contact the account manager for the recharge of prepayment.
sentences.cn: 客户如需再增值预缴服务费,请与商务顾问联系.

sentences.en: Recharge : to out life or energy back into something.
sentences.cn: 充电、重新注入生命或活力.

sentences.en: Right now, the cells are used commercially to recharge cell phones.
sentences.cn: 现在, 电池已经已经商用化用于手机电池充电.

sentences.en: Sorry , I don't. But did you recharge it last night?
sentences.cn: 对不起, 不 知道. 你昨天充电了 吗 ?

sentences.en: The device can recharge a battery in about 25 minutes.
sentences.cn: 该充电器可在约25分钟内完成给电池充电。

sentences.en: Warlock warp throw recharge time increased to 45 seconds.
You can also recharge it by yourself after activation.
sentences.cn: 您也可在激活后,自行充值.

trans.tran_en: to put a new supply of electricity into a  battery

trans.tran_cn: 再充电，再装填（弹药等），再控告，休整，养精蓄锐
